overview: Bill Wetter is responsible for setting technical strategy and driving the creation of all platforms and products for Wonderverse, Inc. Bill has an extensive background in developing/designing both casual games and adaptable platforms for the web. Prior to becoming CTO of Wonderverse he created scores of casual games for clients such as Nickelodeon, Disney, Scholastic, Warner Brothers, and Childrens Television Workshop. Bill has also built scalable back-end and front-end platforms for companies such Yahoo, Buzzmedia, and MTV.
